item.title: ‘Black Swan’ Books Exclusive 15th Anniversary Run in Imax Theaters
item.description: It will be the first time Darren Aronofsky’s acclaimed movie — starring Natalie Porman in her Oscar-winning role as a tortured Ballerina — will be shown on Imax screens.
